channel.title: Rosane Doré Lefebvre

item.title: Mentioned by Huffington Post Canada
item.description:
Rosane Doré Lefebvre, NDP MP, Gives Birth To Baby Girl (TWEETS)
Rosane Doré Lefebvre, who represents the Montreal area riding of Alfred-Pellan, has given birth to a baby girl. Her partner ... She is the second NDP MP to give birth since the last federal election, when a surprising crop of young politicians were elected.

item.title: Mentioned by Vancouver Sun
item.description:
Government won't reveal cost to taxpayers of reality TV show
Reducing this to mere entertainment is unacceptable," New Democratic Party MP Rosane Doré Lefebvre said during question period. "How much is this costing the border services agency for this spectacle?" Toews stood up to read out, for the second of three ...

item.title: Mentioned by Macleans.ca (blog)
item.description:
The Commons: Vic Toews' real world
“The minister has no consideration for those people who, for reasons that are unknown, decided to put their lives in danger to flee their country,” lamented Rosane Doré Lefebvre. “He should think a bit before turning this into a reality show.” That is surely one ...

item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca
item.description:
Toews defends border raid show as CBSA documentary
Quebec NDP MP Rosane Doré Lefebvre, speaking in French, then said the minister has no consideration for individuals who put their lives in danger and decide to flee their country, and that he should think before making a spectacle of their situations.
